inbound.title: Inbound Process (Inbound)
inbound.description: The complete process where a shipper registers an inbound plan in the FULGO WMS, and the logistics company receives and stores the products in the warehouse. The FULGO platform tracks and manages all progress in real-time.

steps.label: Register Inbound Schedule
steps.desc: Register what products will arrive and when
steps.detail: The shipper pre-registers product information (product name, quantity, expected arrival date) in the FULGO system.

steps.label: Send Inbound Information
steps.desc: Notify logistics company of inbound plan
steps.detail: FULGO notifies the logistics company in advance: 'These products will arrive soon' and requests approval.

steps.label: Approve Inbound Schedule
steps.detail: The logistics company reviews warehouse conditions and confirms 'We can receive on this date.' Dock location is also assigned.

steps.label: Assign Inbound Task
steps.detail: The logistics manager assigns to warehouse workers: 'Please process this product inbound today.'

steps.label: Confirm Product Arrival
steps.detail: When the truck arrives with the products, the worker registers in the system 'Products have arrived.'

steps.label: Process Temporary Inbound
steps.detail: Products are temporarily placed in the warehouse without inspection yet and marked as 'Awaiting Inspection.'

steps.label: Complete Product Inspection
steps.detail: The worker carefully scans barcodes and checks 'Is the quantity correct? Is the product intact? Any damage?'

steps.label: Report Inspection Results
steps.detail: The logistics company reports inspection results to FULGO. If there are defective items or quantity discrepancies, the shipper is automatically notified.

steps.label: Issue Product Labels
steps.detail: FULGO system automatically generates barcode labels for each product, and the worker prints and attaches them.

steps.label: Arrange Storage Location
steps.detail: The worker goes to the storage location (e.g., Area A-Shelf 3-Bin 5) that the system specifies and arranges the products.

steps.label: Report Inbound Completion
steps.detail: The logistics company reports to FULGO 'All products are now in the warehouse and ready for sale.'

steps.label: Increase Inventory Quantity
steps.detail: FULGO inventory system increases the inventory count for the product. Now it's ready for sale.

steps.label: Send Inbound Completion Notice
steps.detail: FULGO notifies the shipper 'Inbound is complete. You can now check inventory.'

outbound.title: Outbound Process (Outbound)
outbound.description: The complete process where external sales channels (Coupang, Naver Shopping, etc.) receive orders, FULGO collects them and forwards to the logistics company, which packages and ships products to customers.

steps.label: Customer Orders Product
steps.detail: Customer orders a product from external sales channels like Coupang or Naver Smart Store.

steps.label: Receive Order
steps.detail: The sales channel system creates order information (order number, product, quantity, delivery address) and notifies the shipper.

steps.label: Send Outbound Request
steps.detail: The shipper sends an outbound request to FULGO system 'Please ship this order.'

steps.label: Verify Inventory
steps.detail: FULGO inventory system checks 'Is the requested product in the warehouse? How many?' and reserves the order quantity.

steps.label: Send Outbound Instruction
steps.detail: FULGO instructs the logistics company 'Please pick this product, pack it, and ship it.'

steps.label: Assign Task
steps.detail: The logistics company efficiently bundles orders that arrived around the same time and assigns them to workers at once.

steps.label: Complete Product Search
steps.detail: The worker goes through warehouse shelves, finds ordered products one by one, scans barcodes, and collects them.

steps.label: Complete Packaging
steps.desc: Pack in box and attach shipping label
steps.detail: The worker packs the products in a box and prints and attaches the courier tracking number.

steps.label: Report Outbound Completion
steps.detail: The logistics company reports to FULGO 'Packing complete and tracking number is 123456.'

steps.label: Reduce Inventory
steps.detail: FULGO inventory system reduces inventory quantity by the shipped amount.

steps.label: Send Outbound Completion Notice
steps.detail: FULGO notifies the shipper 'Outbound complete and tracking number is here.'

steps.label: Update Shipping Information
steps.detail: The shipper sends the tracking number to the sales channel system so customers can track delivery.

steps.label: Request Pickup
steps.detail: The logistics company requests pickup from the courier 'Please pick up the packed items.'

steps.label: Send Shipping Status
steps.detail: The courier sends shipping progress updates 'Pickup complete', 'In transit', 'Delivered' in real-time to FULGO.

return.title: Return Process (Return)
return.description: The complete process where a customer requests a return due to a product issue, the logistics company receives and inspects the product, and either returns it to inventory or disposes of it.

steps.label: Request Return
steps.detail: The customer contacts the shipper's customer service 'There's a problem with the product and I want to return it.'

steps.label: Approve Return
steps.detail: The shipper reviews the return reason, approves 'We'll accept the return,' and registers it in FULGO with a return number.

steps.label: Assign Inbound Return
steps.detail: FULGO notifies the logistics company in advance 'This product will be returned soon' and coordinates the schedule.

steps.label: Approve Return Receipt
steps.detail: The logistics company confirms 'We can receive the return on this date' and assigns responsible staff.

steps.label: Send Return Product
steps.detail: The customer repackages the product and sends it to the warehouse address via courier.

steps.label: Confirm Return Arrival
steps.detail: The worker confirms the return product has arrived and registers 'Return product received.'

steps.label: Inspect Returned Product
steps.detail: The worker opens the returned product and determines 'Can it be resold? Does it need repair? Should it be discarded?'

steps.label: Report Inspection Results
steps.detail: The logistics company reports inspection results to FULGO. Classification: '10 units resaleable, 2 need repair, 1 to be discarded.'

steps.label: Process Inventory
steps.detail: FULGO adds resaleable products to inventory and removes items to be discarded.

steps.label: Reposition Products
steps.detail: Resaleable products are reorganized on warehouse shelves, and discardable items are separately processed.

steps.label: Send Return Completion Notice
steps.detail: FULGO notifies the shipper 'Return processing complete and inventory has changed as follows.'

steps.label: Process Refund
steps.detail: The shipper processes refund to the customer.

storage.title: Storage & Inventory Management (Storage)
storage.description: The daily operations where the logistics company efficiently manages warehouse space, and FULGO accurately tracks inventory status by shipper.

steps.label: Set Warehouse Structure
steps.detail: FULGO system systematically registers the warehouse structure for each logistics company divided into zones, racks, and bins.

steps.label: Register Storage Location
steps.detail: The logistics company enters location information on actual warehouse shelves and attaches barcode stickers. Example: 'Zone A-Shelf 3-Bin 5'

steps.label: Move Product Location
steps.detail: The worker moves a product to an easier-to-access location and scans the barcode.

steps.label: Send Movement History
steps.detail: The logistics company reports to FULGO 'We moved the product from A-3-5 to B-2-1.'

steps.label: Update Inventory Location
steps.detail: FULGO inventory system immediately updates the product's new location.

steps.label: Direct Physical Inventory
steps.detail: The logistics company regularly or when needed instructs workers 'Count how many products are actually on this shelf.'

steps.label: Perform Physical Inventory
steps.detail: The worker walks through the warehouse, counts products on each shelf, scans barcodes, and records actual quantities.

steps.label: Send Inventory Results
steps.detail: The logistics company reports 'System shows 100 units but only 98 are actually present.'

steps.label: Adjust Inventory Quantity
steps.detail: FULGO corrects system inventory from 100 to 98 based on actual count.

steps.label: Provide Inventory Status
steps.detail: FULGO provides shippers with 'Current inventory: X units, stored at this location.'

steps.label: Check Inventory Analysis
steps.detail: The shipper checks FULGO dashboard 'Which products sell well, how long inventory sits' etc.

hierarchyInfo.title: Hierarchy Structure
hierarchyInfo.description: This process consists of 3 major layers:
